label: Baseball
title: Playing Baseball
content:
• I started playing baseball when I was 7
  • In college, I loved playing for the club team at UNT
  • Today, I play in the North Texas Amateur Baseball League in Dallas
  • I enjoy the relaxed pace of the game as well as the demand on focus required to play well
  • I have many memories playing with close friends and practicing with my dad

label: Exercise
title: I Love to Exercise
content:
Running

  • I enjoy running to push myself and clear my head
  • I often listen to podcasts while I run
  • My favorite annual race is the Chosen half marathon

Lifting

  • The methodical repetativeness of lifting is really relaxing to me
  • Lifiting is more fun with a friend so that we can catch up as we lift together

Cycling

  • Cycling is the newest hobby that I've gotten into, thanks to my father-in-law
  • I completed a 100k ride and cycled the Trail Ridge Road in Rocky Mountain National Park

label: Hiking
title: Hiking
content:
• My dad took me on my first backpacking trip to Colorado when I was in high school
  • I've gone backpacking with friends throughout college and now go with my wife as well
  • Backpacking is fun because of the quality time spent with people, the solitude, and the incredible scenery
  • I often go to Colorado, but I've also been backpacking in California, Arkansas, New Mexico, and Texas
